greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = [x^n] Product_{k>=1} ((1 + x^(2*k-1))/(1 + x^(2*k)))^n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
mathematica: Table[SeriesCoefficient[Product[((1 + x^(2 k - 1))/(1 + x^(2 k)))^n, {k, 1, n}], {x, 0, n}], {n, 0, 30}]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 03 2017
